children.name: Product defects

Timed out retrying after 10000ms: Expected to find content: 'This is the container App hosted at localhost:8080' within the element: <div.container> but never did.

The command was expected to run against origin `http://localhost:8080` but the application is at origin `about://blank`.

This commonly happens when you have either not navigated to the expected origin or have navigated away unexpectedly.
Check Host This is the container App hosted at localhost:8080 UI and Invoices, Expenses buttons

`cy.visit()` failed because you are attempting to visit a URL that is of a different origin.

You likely forgot to use `cy.origin()`:

`cy.visit('http://localhost:3002/')`
`<commands targeting http://localhost:3002 go here>`

`cy.origin('http://localhost:3001', () => {`
`  cy.visit('http://localhost:3001/')`
`  <commands targeting http://localhost:3001 go here>`
`})`

The new URL is considered a different origin because the following parts of the URL are different:

  > port

You may only `cy.visit()` same-origin URLs within a single test.

The previous URL you visited was:

  > 'http://localhost:3002'

You're attempting to visit this URL:

  > 'http://localhost:3001'

https://on.cypress.io/cannot-visit-different-origin-domain
Check Apps share div with React version 16.14.0

The following error originated from your application code, not from Cypress. It was caused by an unhandled promise rejection.

  > ReactDOM.createRoot is not a function

When Cypress detects uncaught errors originating from your application it will automatically fail the current test.

This behavior is configurable, and you can choose to turn this off by listening to the `uncaught:exception` event.

https://on.cypress.io/uncaught-exception-from-application

Test defects

`cy.visit()` failed trying to load:

http://localhost:8081/

We attempted to make an http request to this URL but the request failed without a response.

We received this error at the network level:

  > Error: connect ECONNREFUSED 127.0.0.1:8081

Common situations why this would fail:
  - you don't have internet access
  - you forgot to run / boot your web server
  - your web server isn't accessible
  - you have weird network configuration settings on your computer
Check Host This is the Remote App hosted at localhost:8081) UI and Invoices, Expenses buttons

`cy.visit()` failed trying to load:

http://localhost:3001/

We attempted to make an http request to this URL but the request failed without a response.

We received this error at the network level:

  > Error: connect ECONNREFUSED 127.0.0.1:3001

Common situations why this would fail:
  - you don't have internet access
  - you forgot to run / boot your web server
  - your web server isn't accessible
  - you have weird network configuration settings on your computer
